repos.name: ruvector
repos.description_original: RuVector is a high performance vector and graph database built in Rust for AI, agentic systems, and real time analytics. It combines HNSW search, dynamic minimum cut coherence, graph intelligence, and self learning memory into one unified engine for scalable, low latency reasoning and structured retrieval.
